release_notes.en-US:
What's New in Clippings for Thunderbird 6.1:
• Improvements to Clippings Manager. On Windows, Clippings Manager now remembers its window size and position
• Improvements to support for multiple displays on Windows. Clippings popup windows and dialogs will now be positioned within the Thunderbird window from which they were opened, instead of always centered on the primary display. This feature is experimental on macOS and Linux, where it is turned off by default
• New option to skip backup reminders if there were no changes to your clippings since the last backup
• In Clippings Manager, the Details Pane can be shown or hidden by pressing CTRL+D (Command+D on macOS)
• User interface improvements to more closely match the rest of Thunderbird, as well as improved support for Dark Mode system themes on macOS and Windows (requires Thunderbird 91 or newer)
• Bug fix: First-time backup dialog doesn't regain focus after Save As dialog dismissed
• Added support for Dutch, French, German, and Portuguese (Brazil)

description.en-US: Saves and manages frequently-entered text for later pasting into email and newsgroup messages in Thunderbird. Pasting a clipping is accomplished with just two mouse clicks, eliminating the hassle of retyping or repetitive copying and pasting. Firefox users can download and install Clippings from Firefox Add-ons or the AE Creations website (https://aecreations.sourceforge.io/clippings/index.php). Features: • Create a clipping from selected text in an email or newsgroup message • Easy access to your clippings from the Clippings context menu in the message editor. Individual clippings can be pasted as rich text if they contain HTML tags. • Make your important clippings stand out with color labels • Assign shortcut keys to clippings for quicker pasting. Just press ALT+SHIFT+Y (Command+Option+V on macOS), then the shortcut key. • Locate the clipping you want to paste by typing its name and selecting it from an autocomplete menu • Define placeholders inside a clipping that you will be prompted to fill in when pasting the clipping. Built-in placeholders for the date, time, clipping name, user agent, etc. are also available. • Organize your collection of clippings into folders using Clippings Manager • Import and export clippings in a variety of file formats • Sync your clippings between Thunderbird and Firefox, or other instances of those applications (requires the Sync Clippings Helper app) To learn more about Clippings, please visit the Clippings page on the AE Creations website: https://aecreations.sourceforge.io/clippings. First-time users should check out the Quick Start guide at https://aecreations.sourceforge.io/clippings/quickstart.php. Supported Languages: English (United States), Dutch, French, German, Portuguese (Brazil). Do you want Clippings in your language? If you are fluent in English and another world language and would like to help update or add a new translation, consider contributing a translation here: https://crowdin.com/project/clippings Help and Support: Questions and comments about Clippings should be posted to the AE Creations Help and Support forums, hosted on Google Groups.
